name: Akhorne The Squirrel
skills: Claws, Dauntless, Dodge, Frenzy, Jump Up, Loner (4+), No Ball, Sidestep, Stunty, Titchy

specialRule.name: Blind Rage
specialRule.description: Akhorne may choose to re-roll the D6 when rolling for the Dauntless Skill.

name: Anqi Panqi
skills: Block, Grab, Loner (4+), Stand Firm, Unsteady

specialRule.name: Savage Blow
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Anqi performs a Block Action against an opposition player he may choose to re-roll any number of the Block Dice.

name: Barik Farblast
skills: Cannoneer, Hail Mary Pass, Loner (4+), Pass, Secret Weapon, Sure Hands, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Blast It!
specialRule.description: Whenever Barik makes a Hail Mary Pass, he may re-roll any Scatter results for determining where the ball lands, and any team-mate attempting to catch the ball applies a +1 modifier to the roll.

name: Bilerot Vomitflesh
skills: Dirty Player, Disturbing Presence, Foul Appearance, Lone Fouler, Loner (4+), Regeneration, Unsteady

specialRule.name: Putrid Regurgitation
specialRule.description: Once per half, Bilerot may use the Projectile Vomit Special Action. This may still be used even if Bilerot has already performed a Block Action this turn.

name: Boa Kon'ssstriktr
skills: Dodge, Fend, Hypnotic Gaze, Loner (4+), Prehensile Tail, Safe Pair of Hands, Sidestep

specialRule.name: Look Into My Eyes
specialRule.description: Once per game, if Boa begins his activation Marking an opposition player in possession of the ball, he may roll a D6. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2+, the opposition player loses possession of the ball, Boa immediately gains possession of the ball, and Boa's activation immediately ends.

name: Bomber Dribblesnot
skills: Accurate, Bombardier, Dodge, Loner (4+), Right Stuff, Sneaky Git, Stunty

name: Captain Karina von Riesz
skills: Bloodlust (2+), Dodge, Hypnotic Gaze, Jump Up, Loner (4+), Regeneration

specialRule.name: Tasty Morsel
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Karina fails a Bloodlust roll, she may choose to bite an opposition player with a ST of 3 or lower as if they were a Thrall Lineman team-mate. Karina may not bite Star Players with this special rule.

name: Cindy Piewhistle
skills: Accurate, Bombardier, Dodge, Loner (4+), Secret Weapon, Stunty

specialRule.name: All You Can Eat
specialRule.description: Once per game, Cindy may perform two Throw Bomb Special Actions rather than one; though she must commit to doing so before making the first Action. If she does, immediately after performing the second Throw Bomb Special Action, roll a D6. On a 1-3, Cindy is immediately Sent-off.

name: Count Luthor von Drakenborg
skills: Block, Hypnotic Gaze, Loner (4+), Regeneration, Sidestep

specialRule.name: Star of the Show
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Count Luthor scores a Touchdown, his controlling coach gains one Team Re-roll until the end of the following Drive. If this Team Re-roll has not been used by the end of the next Drive, it is lost.

name: Deeproot Strongbranch
skills: Block, Bullseye, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Stand Firm, Strong Arm, Thick Skull, Throw Team-mate, Timmm-ber!

specialRule.name: Reliable
specialRule.description: If Deeproot makes a Fumbled Throw when performing a Throw Team-mate Action, the player that was being thrown will Bounce as normal but will automatically land safely.

name: Dribl and Drull
skills: Dirty Player, Dodge, Loner (4+), [Quick Flail], Sidestep, Sneaky Git, Stunty

specialRule.name: A Sneaky Pair
specialRule.description: Dribl & Drull must be hired as a pair. Additionally, whenever Dribl or Drull perform either a Foul Action or a Stab Special Action against an opposition player Marked by both Dribl & Drull, they may apply a +1 modifier to the roll.

name: Eldril Sidewinder
skills: Catch, Dodge, Hypnotic Gaze, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, On the Ball

specialRule.name: Mesmerising Dance
specialRule.description: Once per half, Eldril may re-roll the dice when performing a Hypnotic Gaze Special Action.

name: Estelle la Veneaux
skills: Disturbing Presence, Dodge, Guard, Loner (4+), Sidestep

specialRule.name: Baleful Hex
specialRule.description: Once per game, at the beginning of Estelle's activation, she may select an opposition player within 5 squares and roll a D6. On a 2+, the selected player becomes Distracted and cannot be activated during their team's next Turn.

name: Fungus the Loon
skills: Ball & Chain, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, No Ball, Secret Weapon, Stunty

specialRule.name: Whirling Dervish
specialRule.description: Once per Activation, Fungus may re-roll the D6 when determining which direction he moves in.

name: Glart Smashrip
skills: Block, Claws, Grab, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Stand Firm

specialRule.name: Frenzied Rush
specialRule.description: Once per half, when Glart declares a Blitz Action he may gain the Frenzy Skill until the end of his activation. Glart may not use the Grab Skill during a Turn in which he uses this special rule.

name: Gloriel Summerbloom
skills: Accurate, Dodge, Loner (3+), Pass, Sidestep, Sure Hands

specialRule.name: Shot to Nothing
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Gloriel is activated she may use this special rule. If she does, Gloriel gains the Hail Mary Pass Skill until the end of her activation.

name: Glotl Stop
skills: Animal Savagery, Frenzy, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Prehensile Tail, Stand Firm, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Primal Savagery
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Glotl fails an Animal Savagery roll, it may lash out at an opposition player rather than a team-mate.

name: Grak and Crumbleberry
skills: Bone Head, Kick Team-mate, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: I'll Carry You
specialRule.description: Grak & Crumbleberry must be hired as a pair. Additionally, once per half, if Grak begins his activation adjacent to Crumbleberry he may pick up Crumbleberry; temporarily remove Crumbleberry from the pitch. At the end of Grak's activation, place Crumbleberry in an unoccupied square adjacent to Grak.

name: Grashnak Blackhoof
skills: Frenzy, Horns, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Thick Skull, Unchannelled Fury

specialRule.name: Gored by the Bull
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Grashnak performs a Block Action as part of a Blitz Action, he may make one additional Block Action against the opposition player regardless of their ST, to a maximum of three Block Actions total. If Grashnak performs a second Block Action due to the Frenzy Skill, the second Block Action will also benefit from this rule.

name: Gretchen WÃ¤chter
skills: Disturbing Presence, Dodge, Foul Appearance, Jump Up, Loner (4+), No Ball, Regeneration, Shadowing, Sidestep

specialRule.name: Incorporeal
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Gretchen is activated she may use this special rule. Until the end of her activation, Gretchen does not have to make Dodge rolls for leaving a square within an opposition player's Tackle Zone.

name: Griff Oberwald
skills: Block, Dodge, Fend, Loner (3+), Sprint, Sure Feet

specialRule.name: Consummate Professional
specialRule.description: Once per game, Griff may apply a +1 modifier to an Agility Test he has made. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Grim Ironjaw
skills: Block, Dauntless, Frenzy, Hatred (Big Guy), Loner (4+), Multiple Block, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Slayer
specialRule.description: Once per game, when an opposition Big Guy is Knocked Down as a result of a Block Action performed by Grim, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armour Roll or the Injury Roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Grombrindal
skills: Block, Break Tackle, Dauntless, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Stand Firm, Sure Feet, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Wisdom of the White Dwarf
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Grombrindal is activated he may select one team-mate within 2 squares. The selected team-mate gains one of the following Skills until the end of turn: Break Tackle, Dauntless, Mighty Blow, Sure Feet.

name: Guffle Pusmaw
skills: Foul Appearance, Loner (4+), Monstrous Mouth, Nerves of Steel, On the Ball, Plague Ridden

specialRule.name: Quick Bite
specialRule.description: Once per game, if Guffle is making an opposition player who catches the ball, he may immediately attempt an Armour Roll against that player. If the target's armour is broken, Guffle immediately gains possession of the ball. No Turnover is caused as a result of using this special rule.

name: Hakflem Skuttlespike
skills: Dodge, Extra Arms, Loner (4+), Prehensile Tail, Two Heads

specialRule.name: Threatening Pass
specialRule.description: Once per game, if Hakflem is adjacent to a team-mate who is in possession of the ball when he is activated, then Hakflem can choose to gain possession of the ball. If he does, then the team-mate will immediately be Knocked Down. This will not cause a Turnover even if the team-mate suffers a Casualty.

name: Helmut Wulf
skills: Chainsaw, Loner (4+), No Ball, Pro, Secret Weapon, Stand Firm

specialRule.name: Old Pro
specialRule.description: Once per game, Helmut may use his Pro Skill to re-roll a single dice rolled as part of an Armour Roll.

name: H'thark the Unstoppable
skills: Block, Break Tackle, Defensive, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Sprint, Sure Feet, Thick Skull, Unsteady

specialRule.name: Unstoppable Momentum
specialRule.description: Whenever H'thark performs a Block Action as part of a Blitz Action, he may re-roll a single Block Dice.

name: Ivan 'the Animal' Deathshroud
skills: Block, Disturbing Presence, Hatred (Dwarf), Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Regeneration, Strip Ball, Tackle

specialRule.name: Dwarven Scourge
specialRule.description: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block Action performed by Ivan, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armour Roll or Injury Roll. If this is against a Dwarf player this instead becomes a +2 modifier.

name: Ivar Eriksson
skills: Block, Guard, Loner (4+), Tackle

specialRule.name: Raiding Party
specialRule.description: Once per Drive, when Ivar begins his activation he may select one Open team-mate within 5 squares. The selected player may immediately move 1 square, though they must end this move Marking an opposition player.

name: Jeremiah Kool
skills: Block, Dodge, Diving Catch, Dump-off, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, On the Ball, Pass, Sidestep

specialRule.name: The Flashing Blade
specialRule.description: Once per game, at the start of his activation, Jeremiah may declare a Stab Special Action against an opposition player he is Marking. After performing the Stab Special Action, Jeremiah may then perform a Move Action before his activation ends.

name: Jordell Freshbreeze
skills: Block, Diving Catch, Dodge, Leap, Loner (4+), Sidestep, Steady Footing

specialRule.name: Swift as the Breeze
specialRule.description: Once per game, Jordell can choose to pass a single Dodge, Leap or Rush Test on a 2+, regardless of any modifiers.

name: Josef Bugman
skills: Block, Drunkard, Fend, Loner (3+), Tackle, Taunt, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Dwarfen Grit
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Josef's armour is broken as the result of an Armour Roll, you may choose to have the Armour Roll re-rolled.

name: Karla von Kill
skills: Block, Dauntless, Dodge, Jump Up, Loner (4+)

specialRule.name: Indomitable
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Karla successfully rolls to use her Dauntless Skill, she may increase her ST characteristic to double that of the target of the Block Action.

name: Kiroth Krakeneye
skills: Disturbing Presence, Foul Appearance, Loner (4+), On the Ball, Tackle, Tentacles

specialRule.name: Black Ink
specialRule.description: Once per game, at the start of any of his activations, Kiroth can select an opposition player he is Marking. The selected player becomes Distracted until they are next activated.

name: Kreek Rustgouger
skills: Ball & Chain, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, No Ball, Prehensile Tail, Secret Weapon

specialRule.name: I'll Be Back!
specialRule.description: The first time in a game that Kreek would be Sent-off as per the Secret Weapon Trait, he is not Sent-off and may instead continue as part of the game. Kreek's coach may not Argue the Call when Kreek uses this special rule.

name: Lord Borak the Despoiler
skills: Block, Dirty Player, Leader, Loner (3+), Mighty Blow, Put the Boot In, Sneaky Git

specialRule.name: Lord of Chaos
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Lord Borak performs a Block Action he may re-roll a single Block Dice.

name: Maple Highgrove
skills: Brawler, Grab, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Stand Firm, Tentacles, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Vicious Vines
specialRule.description: Once per half, when Maple declares a Block Action he may do so against an opposition player that is no more than 2 squares away following all the normal rules for performing a Block Action, though he may not follow-up.

name: Max Spleenripper
skills: Chainsaw, Loner (4+), No Ball, Secret Weapon

specialRule.name: Maximum Carnage
specialRule.description: Once per game, after Max performs a Chainsaw Attack Special Action he may immediately perform another Chainsaw Attack Special Action that targets a different opposition player.

name: Morg 'n' Thorg
skills: Block, Bullseye, Hatred (Undead), Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Thick Skull, Throw Team-mate
playsFor: Any team except those from Sylvanian Spotlight

specialRule.name: The Ballista
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Morg performs a Throw Team-mate Action, he may re-roll the Passing Ability Test.

name: Nobbla Blackwart
skills: Block, Chainsaw, Dodge, Loner (4+), No Ball, Saboteur, Secret Weapon, Stunty

specialRule.name: Kick 'em While They're Down!
specialRule.description: Once per game, Nobbla may use the Chainsaw Attack Special Action against a Prone or Stunned opposition player. This does not count as a Foul Action and so Nobbla cannot be Sent-off when using this special rule.

name: Puggy Baconbreath
skills: Block, Dodge, Loner (3+), Nerves of Steel, Right Stuff, Stunty

specialRule.name: Halfling Luck
specialRule.description: Once per game, Puggy may re-roll a single dice that was rolled either as a single dice roll, a multiple dice roll, or a dice pool, though this cannot be a dice that was rolled as part of an Armour Roll, Injury Roll or Casualty Roll.

name: Rashnak Backstabber
skills: Loner (4+), Shadowing, Sidestep, Sneaky Git, Stab

specialRule.name: Toxin Connoisseur
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Rashnak successfully breaks an opposition player's armour as a result of a Stab Special Action, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Ripper Bolgrot
skills: Bullseye, Grab, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Regeneration, Throw Team-mate

specialRule.name: Thinking Man's Troll
specialRule.description: Once per half, Ripper may re-roll a single dice that was rolled either as a single dice roll, a multiple dice roll, or a dice pool, though this cannot be a dice that was rolled as part of an Armour Roll, Injury Roll or Casualty Roll.

name: Rodney Roachbait
skills: Catch, Diving Catch, Jump Up, Loner (4+), On the Ball, Sidestep, Stunty, Wrestle

specialRule.name: Catch of the Day
specialRule.description: Once per half, if Rodney is Standing and begins his activation within 3 squares of a ball which is on the ground he may roll a D6. On a 1-2, nothing happens. On a 3+, Rodney immediately gains possession of the ball.

name: Rowana Forestfoot
skills: Dodge, Dump-off, Guard, Horns, Jump Up, Leap, Loner (4+)

specialRule.name: Bounding Leap
specialRule.description: Once per game, after declaring that she will Leap but before rolling any dice, Rowana may choose to use this special rule. If she does, Rowana suffers no negative modifiers for the Agility test to Leap and may choose to re-roll the result.

name: Roxanna Darknail
skills: Dodge, Frenzy, Jump Up, Juggernaut, Leap, Loner (4+)

specialRule.name: Slashing Nails
specialRule.description: Once per half, when Roxanna declares a Blitz Action, she gains the Claws skill until the end of her activation.

name: Rumbelow Sheepskin
skills: Block, Horns, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Tackle, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Ram
specialRule.description: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block Action performed by Rumbelow, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armour Roll or the Injury Roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Scrappa Sorehead
skills: Dirty Player, Dodge, Loner (4+), Pogo, Right Stuff, Sprint, Stunty, Sure Feet

specialRule.name: Yoink!
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Scrappa attempts to Intercept a Pass Action he may roll a D6. On a 2+, Scrappa doesn't need to Intercept; instead, he will automatically Intercept the Pass Action and gains control of the ball.

name: Scyla Anfingrimm
skills: Claws, Frenzy, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Prehensile Tail, Thick Skull, Unchannelled Fury

specialRule.name: Fury of the Blood God
specialRule.description: Once per game, if Scyla rolls a 1 for his Unchannelled Fury roll after declaring a Block Action then, instead of applying the usual effects of Unchannelled Fury, Scyla may perform two Block Actions instead. The first Block Action must be performed, including the use of the Frenzy skill, before the second one is performed.

name: Skitter Stab-Stab
skills: Dodge, Loner (4+), Prehensile Tail, Shadowing, Stab

specialRule.name: Master Assassin
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Skitter performs a Stab Special Action, he may choose to re-roll the Armour Roll.

name: Skrorg Snowpelt
skills: Block, Claws, Disturbing Presence, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow

specialRule.name: Pump Up the Crowd
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Skorgr causes an opposition player to be removed as a Casualty as the result of a Block Action, Skorgr's controlling coach gains one Team Re-roll until the end of the current Drive. If the Re-roll has not been used by the end of the Drive, it is lost.

name: Skrull Halfheight
skills: Accurate, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, Pass, Regeneration, Sure Hands, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Strong Passing Game
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Skrull performs a Pass Action he may modify the result of the Passing Ability Test by the target's ST characteristic, to a maximum of 6.

name: Swiftvine Glimmershard
skills: Disturbing Presence, Fend, Loner (4+), Sidestep, Stab, Stunty

specialRule.name: Furious Outburst
specialRule.description: Once per half, so long as she is Standing at the start of her activation, Swiftvine can place herself adjacent to a Standing opposition player within 3 squares of her and immediately make a Stab Special Action against them. She may then place herself in an unoccupied square within 3 squares of where she started. Her activation then immediately ends. This counts as the team's Blitz Action for the turn.

name: The Black Gobbo
skills: Bombardier, Disturbing Presence, Dodge, Loner (3+), Sidestep, Sneaky Git, Stab

specialRule.name: Sneakiest of the Lot
specialRule.description: If your team includes the Black Gobbo, then you may declare two Foul Actions per team turn rather than only one. However, the second Foul Action must be declared by the Black Gobbo himself.

name: The Mighty Zug
skills: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Unsteady

specialRule.name: Crushing Blow
specialRule.description: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as the result of a Block Action performed by Zug, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armour roll. This modifier may be applied after the initial Armour roll has been made.

name: The Swift Twins
skills: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Tackle

specialRule.name: Working In Tandem
specialRule.description: The Swift Twins must be hired as a pair. Additionally, if Lucien performs a Block Action against an opposition player who is also Marked by Valen, Lucien may re-roll a single Block Dice.

name: Thorsson Stoutmead
skills: Block, Drunkard, Loner (4+), Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Beer Barrel Bash
specialRule.description: Once per Drive, at the start of his activation, Thorsson may select an opposition player within three squares and roll a D6. On a 3+, the target is immediately Knocked Down. On a 2, nothing happens. On a 1, Thorsson Falls Over. After using this special rule, Thorsson's activation immediately ends.

name: Varag Ghoul-Chewer
skills: Block, Hatred (Undead), Jump Up, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Thick Skull, Unsteady

specialRule.name: Krump and Smash
specialRule.description: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block Action performed by Varag, he may re-roll the Armour Roll.

name: Wilhelm Chaney
skills: Catch, Claws, Frenzy, Loner (4+), Regeneration, Wrestle

specialRule.name: Savage Mauling
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Wilhelm makes an Injury Roll against an opposition player, he may choose to re-roll the result.

name: Willow Rosebark
skills: Dauntless, Loner (4+), Sidestep, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: Woodland Fury
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Willow performs a Block Action that would result in her being Knocked Down, she can choose to re-roll a single Block Dice.

name: Withergrasp Doubledrool
skills: Foul Appearance, Loner (4+), Prehensile Tail, Tackle, Tentacles, Two Heads, Wrestle

specialRule.name: Watch Out!
specialRule.description: The first time each Drive that Withergrasp is the target of a Block Action performed by an opposition player, he counts as having the Dodge Skill.

name: Zolcath the Zoat
skills: Disturbing Presence, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow, Prehensile Tail, Regeneration, Sure Feet

specialRule.name: "Excuse me, are you a Zoat?"
specialRule.description: Once per game, when Zolcath is activated he may select an opposition player within 3 squares. The selected player immediately becomes Distracted.

name: Zzharg Madeye
skills: Cannoneer, Hail Mary Pass, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, Secret Weapon, Thick Skull

specialRule.name: "Blastin' Solves Everything"
specialRule.description: Once per half, at the start of his activation, Zzharg may select a Standing opposition player within 3 squares and roll a D6. On a 3+, the selected player is hit. On a 2, the opposing coach selects a player (from either team, but not Zzharg) within 3 squares of the originally selected player to be hit instead. On a 1, Zzharg hits himself instead. Make an Armour Roll for whichever player is hit. Zzharg's activation then immediately ends.

name: /bb2020
skills: Error fetching data
